attributes.action: Respectfully put to Her Majesty the Queen that a Knighthhod be bestowed on the actor George Cole
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A Knighthood for George Cole would be in recognition to his services to the acting profession. He is highly regarded and fondly remembered as 'Arthur Daley' in the t.v. series Minder, which celebrates its 30th anniversary this year

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
